plugins.title: Plugin Registration
plugins.description:
Map of plugin definitions.

These map keys are not significant to VDI, they are only used for logging and human reference.

siteBuild.title: Site Build Directory Name
siteBuild.description:
Name of the parent directory containing the per-project dataset files subdirectories.

This directory name will be used to form paths such as `{siteBuild}/{installTarget}/{datasetId}`.
